value.title: Fears raised over facial recognition use at Moscow protests

value.title: This new tool can tell you if your online photos are helping train facial recognition systems
value.excerpt: When you post photos of yourself or friends and family online, you may not imagine they could be used to develop facial-recognition systems that can identify individuals offline.
